person.persName: Delos T. Bligh (Louisville, Kentucky, bricklayer and police officer)

body.p: Louisville, Kentucky, bricklayer, soldier, and police officer. Delaware County, New York, native. Married to Cassandra "Kate" Davis Bligh. Father of Mary Bligh and Emma Bligh. Married Kate Ovington Bligh in 1859. Father of Anna Bligh, Amy Bligh, and Lois Bligh. Served in the Louisville Legion (U.S.A.) as a private from May 1846 to November 1846. Deputy city marshal from 1847 to c1852. Bricklayer in Louisville, Kentucky, in 1850. Private policeman at the Louisville Theater from c1852 to 1856. Police officer and detective in Louisville from 1856 to c1890. Member of the Masonic Order.
